docblock.long-description: Add tags to images

tag.name: param
tag.description: The tag value to be added to the image. Multiple tags can be added if comma separated.

tag.name: param
tag.description: 6-digit image ID.

tag.name: param
tag.description: Session ID that is provided when logged in. This is also set as a cookie.

docblock.long-description: List the tags for an image

tag.name: param
tag.description: The 6-digit UID for an image. Also can accept a tag basename if the search_by parameter is set to basename.

tag.name: param
tag.description: Valid values are 'image' or 'basename'.

docblock.long-description: Get all images that have a certain tag.

tag.name: param
tag.description: The basename value for a particular tag.

docblock.long-description: This is used to find suggested tags by giving it parts of text, and it will return the 10 closest matches for existing tags.

tag.name: param
tag.description: Partial text that is used to query for existing tag names.

docblock.long-description: Returns the top 200 used tags and a count of the number of times they are used.

docblock.long-description: Set the UI theme.

tag.name: param
tag.description: Allowed values are "light" or "dark". If the user is logged in, this setting is associated with their account. Otherwise, this value is stored as a browser cookie.

tag.name: param
tag.description: Session ID that is provided when logged in. This is also set as a cookie. Only required if the cookie sid header is not sent and it's desired to have this data saved with a user account.

docblock.long-description: Retrieve currently set UI theme.

tag.name: param
tag.description: Session ID that is provided when logged in. This is also set as a cookie. Only required if the cookie sid header is not sent and it's desired to have this data saved with a user account.

docblock.long-description: Like an image. Must be logged in to use this method.

tag.name: param
tag.description: The 6-digit id of an image.

tag.name: param
tag.description: Session ID that is provided when logged in. This is also set as a cookie. If sid cookie headers are sent, this value is not required.

docblock.long-description: Dislike an image. Must be logged in to use this method.

tag.name: param
tag.description: The 6-digit id of an image.

tag.name: param
tag.description: Session ID that is provided when logged in. This is also set as a cookie. If sid cookie headers are sent, this value is not required.

tag.name: param
tag.description: The 6-digit id of an image.

tag.name: param
tag.description: Session ID that is provided when logged in. This is also set as a cookie. If sid cookie headers are sent, this value is not required.

docblock.long-description: Stop saving a previously saved image. Must be logged in to use this method.

tag.name: param
tag.description: The 6-digit id of an image.

tag.name: param
tag.description: Session ID that is provided when logged in. This is also set as a cookie. If sid cookie headers are sent, this value is not required.

docblock.long-description: Approves an image. If the image was reported, it will resolve all reports. If the image was hidden, it will now be displayed. Must be logged on as admin to access this method.

tag.name: param
tag.description: The 6-digit id of an image.

tag.name: param
tag.description: Session ID that is provided when logged in. This is also set as a cookie. If sid cookie headers are sent, this value is not required.

tag.name: param
tag.description: If an image should be marked as approved, but NSFW, setting this to 'true' or '1' will mark the image that way.

docblock.long-description: Removes an image and everything associated with it. Must be logged on as admin to access this method.

tag.name: param
tag.description: The 6-digit id of an image.

tag.name: param
tag.description: Session ID that is provided when logged in. This is also set as a cookie. If sid cookie headers are sent, this value is not required.

docblock.long-description: Allows uploading images.

tag.name: param
tag.description: An image uploaded as multi-part form data. Must be JPEG, PNG, or GIF format.

tag.name: param
tag.description: An optional external link to comments for the image.

tag.name: param
tag.description: Session ID that is provided when logged in. This is also set as a cookie.

docblock.long-description: Allows adding images to site from remote URL's.

tag.name: param
tag.description: Full URL to an image to be added to the site. Must be JPEG, PNG, or GIF format.

tag.name: param
tag.description: An optional external link to comments for the image.

tag.name: param
tag.description: Session ID that is provided when logged in. This is also set as a cookie.

docblock.long-description: Allows reporting of problematic images so they may undergo review.

tag.name: param
tag.description: The 6-digit id of an image.

tag.name: param
tag.description: Number value representing the reason type which can be found in report/all

tag.name: param
tag.description: Session ID that is provided when logged in. This is also set as a cookie.

docblock.long-description: Retrieve details about a user account.

tag.description: Valid values are 'id' or 'username'.
